original_text:
For you will spread abroad to the right and to the left,
    and your offspring will possess the nations
    and will people the desolate cities.
korean_text: 이는 네가 좌우로 퍼지며 네 자손은 열방을 얻으며 황폐한 성읍들을 사람 살 곳이 되게 할 것임이라

sentences.original_text: For you will spread abroad to the right and to the left,
and your offspring will possess the nations
and will people the desolate cities.
